Pages.Title: Upload your management hierarchy's expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training

Questions.Label: Upload your management hierarchy's expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your management hierarchy's expectations may also be known as your organisation's mission statement, vision statement or set of principles.

The file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select your management hierarchy's expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Tell us how these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training are monitored and evaluated
Pages.LinkTitle: Tell us how these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training are monitored and evaluated

Questions.Label: Tell us how these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training are monitored and evaluated
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how they're:

  • reviewed and monitored
  • reflected in developing and delivering apprenticeship training programmes
  • measured through key performance indicators for the outcomes of apprenticeship training programmes
  • used to benchmark apprenticeship training delivery against industry leaders

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training are monitored and evaluated

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: How are these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training communicated to employees
Pages.LinkTitle: How are these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training communicated to employees

Questions.Label: How are these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training communicated to employees?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how these expectations are:

  • transparent and available to all employees
  • communicated throughout your organisation - for example through training or official policies
  • maintained and what feedback mechanisms your organisation has for employees

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how these expectations for quality and high standards in apprenticeship training are communicated to employees
